website_summaries.verdict: If you're willing to live with some minor design compromises, you can't go wrong with LG's ultrafast G2 workhorse.
pros: The LG G2 has a top-of-the line processor, an expansive screen, and a powerful camera that's lightning-quick
cons: The handset's rear control buttons take time to get used to, its new software features are buried and unintuitive, and there's no microSD card slot

website_summaries.verdict: The Android-powered LG G2 is both super-sized and super-powerful, but it doesn't quite have the chops to unseat the mighty Galaxy S4 as our Editors' Choice smartphone on T-Mobile.
cons: Processor benefit doesn't play out in apps

customer_reviews.title: The LG G2 is a great phone. This International model however
customer_reviews.text: The LG G2 is a great phone. This International model however, is NOT serviceable through ATT in the US and should not be marketed in the United States with the claim it is compatible with this service. After 4 Days of headache and distress, it is going back. If you live in the US this is a bad choice. Thanks in advance Amazon, for allowing this return.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Young

customer_reviews.title: An excellent balance between size, strength and price.
customer_reviews.text: Still going strong, I considered upgrading to the G3 or G4, but they're just too large for my taste. The G2 has one of the best screen to body ratio - with its 5.2" screen in a body the size of most 5" or 5.1" phone, like the Samsung S series or the Nexus 5, etc. Its battery, processor and RAM, which were outstanding when it was first introduced, make it still a viable phone. It stutters a bit with heavy usage and quick switching between apps, but holds its own beautifully with day to day activity.
customer_reviews.author: Eyal Gurevitch

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PHONE
customer_reviews.text: The best battery life ever the lg g2 has prove it self time and time again perfect smart phone should have been advertise a liitle more but all in all its worth it
customer_reviews.author: R. Walker

customer_reviews.title: I thought purchasing an LG product would prevent quality issues... I think I was wrong...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. LCD display stopped working in 24 hs. Couldn't start it back with any of recommended blogs officials or unofficials. (soft, hard reset, clean display pin, you name it). The fact it is a "no warranty" purchase seems a perfect scheem for a fraud from manufacturer (LG). I thought purchasing an LG product would prevent quality issues... I think I was wrong...
customer_reviews.author: Colo

customer_reviews.title: A great phone, in real mint condition
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my father, who lives in Israel, therefore I had to buy an international, unlocked version. The phone works great, and my father just loves it. It arrived in a mint condition, and had no issues at all. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Tal Shachar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect So Fast
customer_reviews.text: I loved this phone, excellent camera, very fast, great screen for the price it is the best phone I would buy. Recommend to all. In works perfectly with Movistar and Movilnet of Venezuelan 3G H +. As for the functionality is pretty good, simple and easy for the user, even has available version of Kit Kat that runs very well. I really did not put any negative aspect and I really liked to lock and unlock the screen with only two touches, this phone is incredibly good.

customer_reviews.title: still works fine to this very day

Mine, which I actually bought before from Wireless Place, still works fine to this very day, however the second, bought from TG Global, we just kept on having problems. First time it was replaced, which was good but the replaced phone went dead again less than a year later. Really disappointed.

I live in Israel and I hope there is a way I can fix it in Israel free of charge. WAITING FOR YOUR SUPPORTING REPLY SOON! +972-54-7681896

I will avoid this seller as I think I received a used cellphone, not a new one as they advertise. Rafa

The attached earphone is poor in both performance and appearance.

I would definitely recommend this phone to anyone who wants a fast phone with a large display and great battery life.

I must say, the LG G2 is great as of now due to its low price. Its budget friendly and provides many features that several low budget phones lack. For example, the LG G2 has the ability to use the newer 802.11ac Wi-Fi that many phones still can't use as of today. I highly recommend this phone to anyone.

I spent over 5 hours trying to get this brick working again.

If I had time I'd keep trying until I got a good one, but I'm going to be trying a Samsung Galaxy S5 instead; slightly more expensive but it has a removable battery and SD card.

customer_reviews.title: NOT Compatible with AT&T
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Unlocked phone expecting it to function with AT&T. Just a fair warning for anyone expecting this to work with AT&T, it won't. Phone calls will work, but you will not be able to use data. I spent approximately 6 hours talking to AT&T in person and at the store. Escalated to the advanced support team who found that this phone is not capable of connecting to AT&T's data networks because it's Unlocked. Simply search the internet for AT&T, no LTE, unlocked phone. You'll get thousands of results where folks buy an unlocked phone expecting it to work, but they don't. Again, if you're expecting to use this phone on AT&T, look for an AT&T phone instead.
customer_reviews.author: T. Swientek

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PHONE!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. I had my doubts about this device but it blew me out of the water in every way possible. The battery life is insane, the performance is insane, the camera is great, and although I am not fan of the touch wiz like UI, the snapdragon 800 sure puts it in place to make it as smooth as possible. My father has a Note 3 and it doesn't run half as smooth as this beast.

product_meta.title: LG G2 D802 16GB Factory Unlocked International Version BLACK - No Warranty
product_meta.description: The maginificent LG G2 is powered by Android 4.2.2 and a super-fast 2.26 GHz Qualcomm Snapdragon 800 quad-core processor.
feature_bullets: 5.2" True HD-IPS + LCD Capacitive Multi-Touchscreen w/ Protective Corning Gorilla Glass 2
